metadata.title: Shelf Productivity
metadata.description: Data from the continental shelf, 1978-1983, assessing patterns of production and their underlying causes.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
